title: Executive Order 8325-Withdrawal of Public Land for Use of the War Department
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, c. 369, 37 Stat. 497, and subject to the conditions therein expressed and to valid existing rights, it is ordered that the following-described public land in Alaska be, and it is hereby, temporarily withdrawn from settlement, location, sale, or entry, and reserved for the use of the War Department for military purposes:
T. 1 S., R. 1 E., sec. 5, lot 6, containing 14.24 acres.
This order shall continue in force until revoked by the President or by act of Congress.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8325-Withdrawal of Public Land for Use of the War Department Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368404
